html: Organizing RSS 2025 Mobile Manipulation workshop.
Introducing BEHAVIOR Robot Suite (BRS), a comprehensive framework for learning whole-body manipulation in diverse household tasks.
Introducing Digital Cousins, which enable an automated real-to-sim-to-real pipeline for robust and scalable robot learning.
TRANSIC and Digital Cousins are accepted at CoRL 2024.
Introducing TRANSIC, a human-in-the-loop method for contact-rich sim-to-real transfer.
Voyager is accepted at TMLR.
One paper called Cross-Episodic Curriculum is accepted at NeurIPS 2023.
I received the Stanford School of Engineering Exceptional Masterâ€™s Student Award [press].
I will be interning at Boston Dynamics AI Institute this summer.
We introduce Voyager, the first LLM-powered lifelong learning agent in Minecraft.
VIMA is accepted at ICML 2023.
ðŸ“¢ Life Update ðŸ“¢ Decided to stay at Stanford for my PhD!
I talked about VIMA at NeurIPS 2022â€™s Foundation Models for Decision Making workshop.
MineDojo wins the Outstanding Paper Award at NeurIPS 2022 D&B.
We release a Transformer agent, VIMA, for multimodal robot manipulation.
We launch MineDojo: open-ended agents with Internet-scale knowledge.
